title: Electron configuration of element in compound

content.question: An unknown element, <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, forms a compound with barium with the formula of <math alttext="B a X 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>BaX</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following could be the electron configuration of a neutral atom of element <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, N e, close bracket, 3 s 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[Ne</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, N e, close bracket, 3 s 2 3 p 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[Ne</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, N e, close bracket, 3 s 2 3 p 5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[Ne</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, N e, close bracket, 3 s 2 3 p 6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[Ne</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, N e, close bracket, 3 s 2 3 p 5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>[Ne</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
